trans-unit.source: When l(state=present) the module will attempt to create the specified DNS zone if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 当l(state=present)时,如果指定的DNS区域还不存在,该模块将尝试创建该区域。

trans-unit.source: When l(type=secondary), the DNS server will immediately attempt to perform a zone transfer from the servers in this list. If this initial transfer fails, then the zone will be left in an unworkable state. This module does not verify the initial transfer.
trans-unit.target: 当l(type=secondary)时,DNS服务器将立即尝试从这个列表中的服务器中进行一次区域转移。如果这个初始转移失败,那么该区将处于无法工作的状态。本模块不验证初始转移。

trans-unit.source: When lacp timeout type is 'Fast', user-defined time can be a number(3~90).
trans-unit.target: 当lacp超时类型为'Fast'时,用户自定义的时间可以是一个数字(3~90)。

trans-unit.source: When lease pool is referenced in full path format, the partition parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当以全路径格式引用租用池时，将忽略 partition 参数。

trans-unit.target: 当list_all=no且未设置value时,在name中包含设置值的字符串。

trans-unit.source: When list_all=yes, a dict containing key/value pairs of multiple configuration settings
trans-unit.target: 当list_all=yes时,一个包含多个配置设置的键/值对的dict。

trans-unit.source: When looking up a path for parameters under it a dictionary will be returned for each path. If there is no parameter under that path then the return will be successful but the dictionary will be empty.
trans-unit.target: 当查找一个路径下的参数时,将为每个路径返回一个字典。如果该路径下没有参数,则返回成功,但字典为空。

trans-unit.source: When network options are changed, the module disconnects all containers from the network, deletes the network, and re-creates the network. It does not try to reconnect containers, except the ones listed in (connected, and even for these, it does not consider specific connection options like fixed IP addresses or MAC addresses. If you need more control over how the containers are connected to the network, loop the community.docker.docker_container module to loop over your containers to make sure they are connected properly.
trans-unit.target: 更改网络选项后，模块将断开所有容器与网络的连接，删除网络，然后重新创建网络。它不会尝试重新连接容器，除了（connected中列出的那些容器，即使对于这些容器，它也不会考虑特定的连接选项，例如固定IP地址或MAC地址。如果您需要对容器如何连接到网络的更多控制权， ，循环一下community.docker.docker_container模块以遍历您的容器，以确保它们正确连接。

trans-unit.source: When network options are changed, the module disconnects all containers from the network, deletes the network, and re-creates the network. It does not try to reconnect containers, except the ones listed in (connected, and even for these, it does not consider specific connection options like fixed IP addresses or MAC addresses. If you need more control over how the containers are connected to the network, loop the community.general.docker_container module to loop over your containers to make sure they are connected properly.
trans-unit.target: 更改网络选项后，模块将断开所有容器与网络的连接，删除网络，然后重新创建网络。它不会尝试重新连接容器，除了（connected中列出的那些容器，即使是这些容器，它也不会考虑特定的连接选项，例如固定IP地址或MAC地址。如果您需要对容器如何连接到网络的更多控制权， ，循环community.general.docker_container模块以遍历您的容器，以确保它们正确连接。

trans-unit.source: When networks are provided to the module via the networks option, the module behaves differently than docker run --network: docker run --network other will create a container with network other attached, but the default network not attached. This module with networks: {name: other} will create a container with both default and other attached. If purge_networks is set to yes, the default network will be removed afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 通过networks选项将网络提供给模块时，模块的行为与 docker run --network 不同： docker run --network other 将创建一个容器，其中该容器附加了network other ，但默认网络未附加。具有以下网络的模块：{name：other}将创建一个容器，其中包含 default 容器和 other 容器。如果将purge_networks设置为 yes ，则此后将删除 default 网络。

trans-unit.source: When passing a hashed password it must be generated with the format 'str["md5"] + md5[ password + username ]', resulting in a total of 35 characters. An easy way to do this is echo "md5$(echo -n 'verysecretpasswordJOE' | md5sum | awk '{print $1}'").
trans-unit.target: 传递散列密码时，必须使用格式 'str["md5"] + md5[ password + username ]' 生成密码，总共35个字符。一种简单的方法是 echo "md5$(echo -n 'verysecretpasswordJOE' | md5sum | awk '{print $1}' ”）。

trans-unit.source: When passing a simple string, field is assumed to be password.
trans-unit.target: 传递简单字符串时，将字段假定为 password 。

trans-unit.source: When passing an MD5-hashed password, you must generate it with the format 'str["md5"] + md5[ password + username ]', resulting in a total of 35 characters. An easy way to do this is echo "md5$(echo -n 'verysecretpasswordJOE' | md5sum | awk '{print $1}'").
trans-unit.target: 传递MD5哈希密码时，必须使用格式 'str["md5"] + md5[ password + username ]' 生成密码，总共35个字符。一种简单的方法是 echo "md5$(echo -n 'verysecretpasswordJOE' | md5sum | awk '{print $1}' ”）。

trans-unit.source: When passing an MD5-hashed password, you must generate it with the format 'str["md5"] + md5[ password + username ]', resulting in a total of 35 characters. An easy way to do this is echo "md5`echo -n 'verysecretpasswordJOE' | md5sum | awk '{print $1}'`".
trans-unit.target: 传递MD5哈希密码时，必须使用格式 'str["md5"] + md5[ password + username ]' 生成密码，总共35个字符。一个简单的方法是 echo "md5`echo -n 'verysecretpasswordJOE' | md5sum | awk '{print $1}'`" 。

trans-unit.source: When processing wait_for, each commands’ output is stored as an element of the result array. The allowed operators for conditional evaluation are eq, ==, neq, ne, !=, gt, >, ge, >=, lt, <, le, <=, contains, matches. Operators can be prefaced by not to negate their meaning. The contains operator searches for a substring match (like the Python in operator). The matches operator searches using a regex search operation.
trans-unit.target: 在处理wait_for时，每个命令的输出都存储为结果数组的元素。条件评估允许的运算符为eq，==，neq，ne，！=，gt，>，ge，> =，lt，<，le，<=，contains，matchs。可以以不否定其含义为开头。该包含的子字符串匹配（如Python的运算符搜索中运算符）。该匹配使用正则表达式搜索操作运算符搜索。

trans-unit.source: When provided at a generic level and a more specific level, the more specific wins:
trans-unit.target: 当提供的是通用水平和更具体的水平时,更具体的获胜。

trans-unit.target: 在vpc内配置时,分配一个公共IP地址。Boto库必须是2.13.0+。

trans-unit.source: When pulling files (file_pull is True) to the NXOS device, feature scp-server is not required.
trans-unit.target: 当把文件(file_pull为True)拉到NXOS设备时,不需要scp-server功能。

trans-unit.source: When pushing files (file_pull is False) to the NXOS device, feature scp-server must be enabled.

trans-unit.source: When removing a VM using state=absent, also remove associated resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用state = absent删除VM 时，还要删除关联的资源。

trans-unit.target: 从数据库中删除语言时，依赖关系可能会阻止数据库被删除。在这种情况下，您可以指定cascade = yes来自动删除依赖于该语言的对象（例如该语言中的函数）。

trans-unit.target: 当删除一个包时,也要删除它的依赖关系,前提是其他包不需要,而且用户没有明确安装。

trans-unit.source: When removing a package, also remove its dependencies, provided that they are not required by other packages and were not explicitly installed by a user. This option is deprecated since 2.8 and will be removed in 2.10, use `extra_args=--recursive`.
trans-unit.target: 当删除一个包时,也会删除它的依赖关系,前提是这些依赖关系不是其他包所需要的,也不是用户明确安装的。这个选项从2.8开始就不适用了,将在2.10中被删除,请使用`extra_args=--递归`。

trans-unit.source: When removing a profile either username must be set to a valid account, or name is set to the profile's base name.
trans-unit.target: 删除配置文件时，必须将用户名设置为有效帐户，或者将名称设置为配置文件的基本名称。

trans-unit.source: When removing a repository, beware that the metadata cache may still remain on disk until you run yum clean all. Use a notification handler for this.
trans-unit.target: 删除存储库时，请注意，在运行 yum clean all 之前，元数据缓存可能仍保留在磁盘上。为此使用通知处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When removing an existing container, the docker daemon API call exists after the container is scheduled for removal. Removal usually is very fast, but it can happen that during high I/O load, removal can take longer. By default, the module will wait until the container has been removed before trying to (re-)create it, however long this takes.
trans-unit.target: 当移除现有容器时,docker守护程序API调用存在于容器被安排移除之后。移除通常是非常快的,但可能发生在高I/O负载期间,移除可能需要更长的时间。默认情况下,该模块会等到容器被移除后再尝试(重新)创建它,无论这需要多长时间。

trans-unit.source: When removing host all connected volumes will be disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 当移除主机时,所有连接的卷将被断开。

trans-unit.source: When removing limit, they are set to 0, and not quite removed.
trans-unit.target: 去除限制时,它们被设置为0,而不是完全去除。

trans-unit.source: When removing package, force remove package, without any checks. Same as `extra_args="--nodeps --nodeps"`. When update_cache, force redownload repo databases. Same as `update_cache_extra_args="--refresh --refresh"`.
trans-unit.target: 删除包时,强制删除包,不做任何检查。同`extra_args="--nodeps --nodeps"`。update_cache时,强制重新下载repo数据库,同`update_cache_extra_args`。同`update_cache_extra_args="--refresh --refresh"`。

trans-unit.source: When requested, but can be null.
trans-unit.target: 要求时,但可以为空。

trans-unit.source: When reset is passed as an option's value, if the option was set previously, it will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 当重置作为一个选项的值传递时,如果该选项之前已被设置,则会被删除。

trans-unit.source: When reuse_existing_ip_allowed is true, supplement with this option to only reuse an Elastic IP if it is tagged with tag_name.
trans-unit.target: 当 reuse_existing_ip_allowed 为真时,补充这个选项,只有当一个 Elastic IP 被标记为 tag_name 时,才会重用它。

trans-unit.source: When revoking privileges, RESTRICT is assumed (see PostgreSQL docs).
trans-unit.target: 撤消特权时，将假定为 RESTRICT （请参阅PostgreSQL文档）。

trans-unit.source: When run on Ansible 2.5 or greater, path defaults to ansible's remote_tmp setting
trans-unit.target: 当在Ansible 2.5或更高版本上运行时,路径默认为ansible的远程_tmp设置。

trans-unit.source: When run on Ansible prior to 2.5, it defaults to TMPDIR, TEMP or TMP env variables or a platform specific value.
trans-unit.target: 在2.5之前的Ansible上运行时，其默认值为 TMPDIR ， TEMP 或 TMP env变量或平台特定的值。

trans-unit.source: When running a command through win_command, the standard Windows argument rules apply:
trans-unit.target: 通过 win_command 运行命令时，将使用标准Windows参数规则：

trans-unit.source: When running a playbook, Ansible finds the variables in the unencrypted file, which pulls the sensitive variable values from the encrypted file. There is no limit to the number of variable and vault files or their names.
trans-unit.target: 当运行playbook时,Ansible会在未加密的文件中找到变量,从而从加密的文件中提取敏感的变量值。变量和库文件的数量和名称没有限制。

trans-unit.source: When running a playbook, you may wish to prompt the user for certain input, and can do so with the ‘vars_prompt’ section.
trans-unit.target: 运行剧本时，您可能希望提示用户进行某些输入，并可以通过“ vars_prompt”部分进行输入。

trans-unit.source: When running any command with the Ansible ad hoc CLI (as opposed to Playbooks), pay particular attention to shell quoting rules, so the local shell retains the variable and passes it to Ansible. For example, using double rather than single quotes in the above example would evaluate the variable on the box you were on.
trans-unit.target: 当使用Ansible ad hoc CLI（与Playbooks相对）运行任何命令时，请特别注意shell引用规则，因此本地shell将保留变量并将其传递给Ansible。例如，在上面的示例中使用双引号而不是单引号将在您所在的框中评估变量。

trans-unit.source: When running fetch with become, the ansible.builtin.slurp module will also be used to fetch the contents of the file for determining the remote checksum. This effectively doubles the transfer size, and depending on the file size can consume all available memory on the remote or local hosts causing a MemoryError. Due to this it is advisable to run this module without become whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 当运行与取 become ，所述ansible.builtin.slurp模块也将被用于获取文件的内容，用于确定所述远程校验。这实际上使传输大小增加了一倍，并且取决于文件大小，可能会消耗远程或本地主机上的所有可用内存，从而导致 MemoryError 。由于这是明智的不运行该模块 become 只要有可能。

trans-unit.source: When running fetch with become, the slurp module will also be used to fetch the contents of the file for determining the remote checksum. This effectively doubles the transfer size, and depending on the file size can consume all available memory on the remote or local hosts causing a MemoryError. Due to this it is advisable to run this module without become whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 当运行与取 become 中，嘟嘟地喝模块也将被用于获取文件的内容，用于确定所述远程校验。这实际上使传输大小增加了一倍，并且取决于文件大小，可能会消耗远程或本地主机上的所有可用内存，从而导致 MemoryError 。由于这是明智的不运行该模块 become 只要有可能。

trans-unit.source: When running on PowerShell v3.0, there is a bug with the WinRM service that limits the amount of memory available to WinRM. Without this hotfix installed, Ansible will fail to execute certain commands on the Windows host. These hotfixes should be installed as part of the system bootstrapping or imaging process. The script Install-WMF3Hotfix.ps1 can be used to install the hotfix on affected hosts.
trans-unit.target: 在PowerShell v3.0上运行时，WinRM服务存在一个错误，该错误会限制WinRM可用的内存量。没有安装此修补程序，Ansible将无法在Windows主机上执行某些命令。这些修补程序应作为系统引导或映像过程的一部分进行安装。脚本Install-WMF3Hotfix.ps1可用于在受影响的主机上安装此修补程序。

trans-unit.source: When running on PowerShell v3.0, there is a bug with the WinRM service that limits the amount of memory available to WinRM. Without this hotfix installed, Ansible will fail to execute certain commands on the Windows host. These hotfixes should installed as part of the system bootstrapping or imaging process. The script Install-WMF3Hotfix.ps1 can be used to install the hotfix on affected hosts.
trans-unit.target: 在PowerShell v3.0上运行时，WinRM服务存在一个错误，该错误会限制WinRM可用的内存量。没有安装此修复程序，Ansible将无法在Windows主机上执行某些命令。这些修补程序应作为系统引导或映像过程的一部分进行安装。脚本Install-WMF3Hotfix.ps1可用于在受影响的主机上安装此修补程序。

trans-unit.source: When running on Python 3 this argument dictates which file descriptors should be passed to an underlying Popen constructor. On Python 2, this will set close_fds to False.
trans-unit.target: 在Python 3上运行时，此参数指示应将哪些文件描述符传递给基础 Popen 构造函数。在Python 2上，这会将 close_fds 设置为False。

trans-unit.source: When running on python3 this argument dictates which file descriptors should be passed to an underlying Popen constructor.

trans-unit.source: When running queries from a file, returns result of the last query.
trans-unit.target: 当从文件运行查询时,返回最后一次查询的结果。

trans-unit.source: When running the playbook, use “–ask-vault-pass” to decrypt the private key.
trans-unit.target: 运行剧本时，请使用“ –ask-vault-pass”来解密私钥。

trans-unit.source: When running the playbook, which runs top to bottom, hosts with failed tasks are taken out of the rotation for the entire playbook. If things fail, simply correct the playbook file and rerun.
trans-unit.target: 在运行播放库时,从上到下,任务失败的主机会被带出整个播放库的轮换。如果事情失败了,只需修正playbook文件并重新运行即可。

trans-unit.source: When running this module in an HA environment via SSH connection and using a role other than admin or root, you may see a Change Pending status, even if you did not make any changes. This is being tracked with ID429869.
trans-unit.target: 当通过SSH连接在HA环境中运行该模块并使用 admin 或 root 以外的角色时，即使您未进行任何更改，您也可能会看到“ Change Pending 状态。ID429869对此进行了跟踪。

trans-unit.source: When running through WinRM, Windows restricts access to internal Windows APIs like the Windows Update API and DPAPI, which some installers and programs rely on.
trans-unit.target: 当通过WinRM运行时,Windows会限制对Windows内部API的访问,如Windows更新API和DPAPI,一些安装程序和程序依赖这些API。

trans-unit.source: When searching for a matching certificate, control how to find matches in the certificate subject name.

trans-unit.source: When selected, excludes all discovered subnets in this network from consideration for virtual service placement.
trans-unit.target: 选中时,将此网络中所有已发现的子网排除在虚拟服务放置的考虑范围之外。

trans-unit.source: When server-side filtering is introduced, it should be preferred over this.
trans-unit.target: 在引入服务器端过滤的时候,应该优先于此。

trans-unit.source: When serving responses to signed URL requests, Cloud CDN will internally behave as though all responses from this backend had a "Cache-Control: public, max-age=[TTL]" header, regardless of any existing Cache-Control header. The actual headers served in responses will not be altered.
trans-unit.target: 在向已签名的 URL 请求提供响应时,Cloud CDN 将在内部表现为来自该后端的所有响应都有一个 "Cache-Control:public,max-age=[TTL]"头,而不考虑任何现有的 Cache-Control 头。响应中提供的实际头不会被改变。

trans-unit.source: When set enable_non_ssl_port=true, the non-ssl Redis server port 6379 will be enabled.

trans-unit.target: 与 write_files 一起设置为 True 时，此回调将为每个任务写入1个文件，而不是整个剧本运行时写入1个文件

trans-unit.source: When set to true, delete all variables which are not untouched in the task.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 时，删除任务中所有未更改的变量。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, the volume will be deleted upon instance termination.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 时，实例终止后将删除该卷。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, will delete and recreate the existing MariaDB database if any of the properties don't match what is set.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 时，如果任何属性与设置不匹配，将删除并重新创建现有的MariaDB数据库。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, will delete and recreate the existing MySQL database if any of the properties don't match what is set.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 时，如果任何属性与设置不匹配，将删除并重新创建现有的MySQL数据库。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, will delete and recreate the existing PostgreSQL database if any of the properties don't match what is set.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 时，如果任何属性与设置不匹配，将删除并重新创建现有的PostgreSQL数据库。

trans-unit.source: When set to user, the key is stored in a path only accessible by the current user.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 user 时，密钥存储在当前用户只能访问的路径中。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes and networks, volumes, images, containers or disk_usage is set to yes then output will contain verbose information about objects matching the full output of API method. For details see the documentation of your version of Docker API at L(https://docs.docker.com/engine/api/).
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 yes 和网络，卷，图像，容器或disk_usage被设置为 yes 则输出将包含冗长大约匹配API方法的全部输出对象的信息。有关详细信息，请访问L（https://docs.docker.com/engine/api/），查看您的Docker API版本的文档。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes and nodes, services or tasks is set to yes, then the module output will contain verbose information about objects matching the full output of API method.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 yes 且将node，services或task设置为 yes 时，模块输出将包含有关与API方法的完整输出匹配的对象的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes and objects referred within the policy exist on the BIG-IP, those will be used instead of the objects defined in the policy.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 yes 并且BIG-IP中存在策略中引用的对象时，将使用这些对象代替策略中定义的对象。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes any existing policy with the same name will be overwritten by the new import.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时,任何具有相同名称的现有策略都将被新导入覆盖。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes leading spaces and tabs are stripped from the start of a line to a block.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时,前导空格和制表符将从行的开头剥离到一个块。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes symbolic links will be followed, if they exist.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时,将遵循符号链接（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes the traffic_group will be inherited from the containing folder. When not specified the system sets this to no when creating new router profile.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时， traffic_group 将从包含的文件夹继承。如果未指定，则系统在创建新的路由器配置文件时将其设置为 no 。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes the GSLB Vserver state will be set to disabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，GSLB Vserver状态将设置为 disabled 。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes the cs vserver will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，cs vserver将被禁用。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes the first newline after a block is removed (block, not variable tag!).
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 yes 时,将删除块之后的第一个换行符（块，不是可变标签！）。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes the lb vserver will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，lb vserver将被禁用。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes the service group state will be set to DISABLED.
trans-unit.target: 设置为“ yes ，服务组状态将设置为“禁用”。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes the service state will be set to DISABLED.
trans-unit.target: 设置为“ yes ，服务状态将设置为“禁用”。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes the system selects this topology record, when the request destination does not match.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes ，则当请求目标不匹配时，系统将选择此拓扑记录。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, applies the HSTS policy to the HSTS host and its sub-domains.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，将HSTS策略应用于HSTS主机及其子域。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, create a backup file including the timestamp information so you can get the original file back if you somehow clobbered it incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，请创建一个包含时间戳信息的备份文件，这样，如果您以某种方式对其进行了不正确的处理，则可以找回原始文件。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, enables the HSTS settings.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，启用HSTS设置。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, replace the remote file when contents are different than the source.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，如果内容不同于源文件，则替换远程文件。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, return the number of nodes matched by xpath.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，返回xpath匹配的节点数。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, runs daemon-reload even if the module does not start or stop anything.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，即使模块未启动或停止任何操作，也将运行daemon-reload。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, source address translation is allowed only on the specified egress_interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，仅在指定的 egress_interfaces 上允许源地址转换。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, the traffic_group will be inherited from the containing folder. When not specified the system sets this to no when creating new router profile.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时， traffic_group 将从包含的文件夹继承。如果未指定，则系统在创建新的路由器配置文件时将其设置为 no 。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, the task will fail if the remote file cannot be read for any reason.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，如果由于某种原因无法读取远程文件，任务将失败。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, will allow traffic to be sent unencrypted.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，将允许不加密地发送流量。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, will retrieve all alternate chains offered by the ACME CA. These will not be written to disk, but will be returned together with the main chain as all_chains. See the documentation for the all_chains return value for details.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，将检索ACME CA提供的所有备用链。这些不会被写入磁盘，但是会与主链一起作为 all_chains 返回。有关详细信息，请参见有关 all_chains 返回值的文档。

trans-unit.source: When set to yes, will retrieve all alternate trust chains offered by the ACME CA. These will not be written to disk, but will be returned together with the main chain as all_chains. See the documentation for the all_chains return value for details.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 yes 时，将检索ACME CA提供的所有备用信任链。这些不会被写入磁盘，但是会与主链一起作为 all_chains 返回。有关详细信息，请参见有关 all_chains 返回值的文档。

trans-unit.source: When set to enable the RA port can be exposed using the debug module.
trans-unit.target: 设置为启用时，可以使用调试模块公开RA端口。

trans-unit.source: When set to enable the console port is locked from root login.
trans-unit.target: 设置为启用时，控制台端口被锁定，无法进行root登录。

trans-unit.source: When set to Broadcast Subnet the ipv4addr parameter is used to specify the subnet.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为广播子网时,ipv4addr参数用于指定子网。

trans-unit.source: When set to False, separate requests will be made fetching interfaces, services, and IP addresses for each device_id and virtual_machine_id.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为False时,将为每个device_id和virtual_machine_id单独请求获取接口、服务和IP地址。

trans-unit.source: When set to YES, this option causes the DNS replies from this vserver to have the RA bit turned on. Typically one would set this option to YES, when the vserver is load balancing a set of DNS servers thatsupport recursive queries.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 "YES "时,这个选项会使来自这个vs服务器的DNS回复开启RA位。通常情况下,当vs服务器正在对一组支持递归查询的DNS服务器进行负载均衡时,会将该选项设置为YES。

trans-unit.source: When set to `PT0S`, the time limit is infinite.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为`PT0S`时,时间限制为无限。

trans-unit.source: When set to `false`, the network is created in "custom subnet mode" so the user can explicitly connect subnetwork resources.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 "false "时,网络是在 "自定义子网模式 "下创建的,因此用户可以明确地连接子网资源。

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, the network is created in "auto subnet mode" and it will create a subnet for each region automatically across the `10.128.0.0/9` address range.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 "true "时,网络是以 "自动子网模式 "创建的,它会在 "10.128.0.0/9 "地址范围内自动为每个区域创建一个子网。

trans-unit.source: When set to an <IP> and transparent is yes, the device performs a health check on that IP address, routes the check through the associated node IP address, and marks the associated node IP address up or down accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为<IP>且 transparent 为 yes 时，设备将对该IP地址执行运行状况检查，并将检查路由通过关联的节点IP地址，并相应地将关联的节点IP地址标记为向上或向下。

trans-unit.source: When set to an <IP> the device performs a health check on that IP address and marks the associated node up or down as a result of the response. This option is set by the device by default when not defined during monitor creation.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为<IP>时，设备将对该IP地址执行运行状况检查，并根据响应将节点标记为向上或向下。在监视器创建过程中未定义时，默认情况下由设备设置此选项。

trans-unit.source: When set to c(yes) the system selects this topology record, when the request destination does not match.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为c(yes)时,当请求目的地不匹配时,系统会选择该拓扑记录。

trans-unit.source: When set to c(yes) the system selects this topology record, when the request source does not match.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为c(yes)时,当请求源不匹配时,系统会选择该拓扑记录。

trans-unit.source: When set to c(yes) the system selects this topology region, when the request source does not match.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为c(yes)时,当请求源不匹配时,系统会选择该拓扑区域。

trans-unit.source: When set to c(yes), the system selects this topology region when the request source does not match.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为c(yes)时,当请求源不匹配时,系统会选择该拓扑区域。

trans-unit.source: When set to false, an error is raised when the pg_hba file doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 设置为false时，如果 pg_hba 文件不存在，则会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: When set to no, keep the existing load balancer rules in place. Will modify and add, but will not delete.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 "否 "时,保留现有的负载均衡器规则。将修改和添加,但不会删除。

trans-unit.source: When set to none, the Volume blocks will not be tiered to the capacity tier.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 "无 "时,"卷 "块将不会分层到容量层。

trans-unit.source: When set to smart, Ansible will try them until one succeeds or they all fail
trans-unit.target: 当设置为智能时,Ansible将尝试它们,直到其中一个成功或全部失败为止

trans-unit.source: When set to true, BIG-IQ manually synchronizes configuration changes between members in a DSC cluster.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 "true "时,BIG-IQ将手动同步DSC集群中成员之间的配置更改。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, BIG-IQ will manually synchronize configuration changes between members in a DSC cluster.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 "true "时,BIG-IQ将手动同步DSC集群中成员之间的配置更改。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, all variables which are not untouched in the task will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 "true "时,任务中所有未被触及的变量将被删除。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, only VMs that target this reservation by name can consume this reservation. Otherwise, it can be consumed by VMs with affinity for any reservation. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 "true "时,只有以该预订为目标的虚拟机可以消费该预订。否则,对任何保留具有亲和力的虚拟机都可以使用该保留。默认值为false。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, validates the SSL certificate of NSO when using SSL
trans-unit.target: 设置为 "true "时,使用SSL时验证NSO的SSL证书。

trans-unit.source: When set, access_logs_enabled must also be set.
trans-unit.target: 设置后，还必须设置access_logs_enabled。

trans-unit.target: 设置后，还必须设置access_logs_s3_bucket。

trans-unit.source: When set, existing attributes will be compared to the list as a whole, any differences means all attributes will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 当设置时,现有的属性将与列表整体进行比较,任何差异都意味着所有属性将被替换。

trans-unit.source: When set, matching of responses to requests is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置时,将禁用对请求的响应的匹配。

trans-unit.source: When setting x86, will ensure Chocolatey installs the x86 package even when on an x64 bit OS.
trans-unit.target: 设置 x86 时，即使在x64位OS上，也可以确保Chocolatey安装x86软件包。

trans-unit.source: When setting an empty list of DNS server addresses on an adapter with DHCP enabled, a change will always be registered, since it is not possible to detect the difference between a DHCP-sourced server value and one that is statically set.
trans-unit.target: 当在启用了DHCP的适配器上设置一个空的DNS服务器地址列表时,由于无法检测到DHCP来源的服务器值和静态设置的服务器值之间的差异,所以总是会登记更改。

trans-unit.source: When setting role as "intercluster" or "cluster", setting protocol is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 将角色设置为 "intercluster "或 "cluster "时,不支持设置协议。

trans-unit.target: 将角色设置为 "intercluster "时,不支持设置协议。

trans-unit.source: When setting this option to true, the module will report 502 as an error.
trans-unit.target: 当将此选项设置为 "true "时,模块将报告502为错误。

trans-unit.target: 设置为 no 时，数据包为纯文本格式，任何嗅探网络的人都可以看到，其中包括任何处理选项。

trans-unit.target: 当指定时,ASM策略将从提供的字符串中创建。

trans-unit.source: When specified, password is ignored.

trans-unit.target: 指定后，将证书返回值过滤为单个证书

trans-unit.target: 当指定时,路由域策略会覆盖设备策略,并被虚拟服务器策略覆盖。

trans-unit.source: When specified, will wait for either available status for state present. Unfortunately this is ignored for delete actions due to a difference in behaviour from AWS.

trans-unit.source: When specifying a custom prefix, schedule must also be specified.
trans-unit.target: 当指定自定义前缀时,还必须指定时间表。

trans-unit.target: 指定新监视器时，如果 adaptive 为 yes ，并且 type 为 relative ，则默认值为 25 ％。

trans-unit.source: When specifying a new monitor, if adaptive is yes, the default is relative
trans-unit.target: 指定新监视器时，如果 adaptive 为 yes ，则默认为 relative

trans-unit.source: When specifying a new monitor, if adaptive is yes, the default is relative.
trans-unit.target: 指定新监视器时，如果 adaptive 为 yes ，则默认值为 relative 。

trans-unit.target: 当指定日程表时,可以设置自定义前缀,否则前缀将被设置为snapmirror_label。

trans-unit.source: When specifying complex args as a variable, the variable must use the full jinja2 variable syntax (`{{var_name}}`) - bare variable names there are no longer accepted. In fact, even specifying args with variables has been deprecated, and will not be allowed in future versions:
trans-unit.target: 将复杂参数指定为变量时，该变量必须使用完整的jinja2变量语法（ `{{var_name}}` ）-不再接受裸变量名称。实际上，甚至不建议使用变量指定args，并且在以后的版本中将不允许使用：

trans-unit.source: When specifying distributed virtual portgroup make sure given esxi_hostname or cluster is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 指定分布式虚拟端口组时，请确保给定的 esxi_hostname 或 cluster 与其关联。

trans-unit.source: When specifying new nameservers, if this value is not provided, the default is 53.
trans-unit.target: 指定新的名称服务器时，如果未提供此值，则默认值为 53 。

trans-unit.target: 指定规则时，如果未指定此参数，则默认值为 all-other 。

trans-unit.source: When specifying rules, if this parameter is not specified, the default is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 指定规则时，如果未指定此参数，则默认值为 unspecified 。

trans-unit.target: 指定目标时，input和input_path是互斥和可选参数。

trans-unit.source: When specifying the name of a single setting, supply a value to set that setting to the given value.
trans-unit.target: 当指定单个设置的名称时,提供一个值将该设置设置为给定值。

trans-unit.source: When specifying this argument, the task should also modify the diff_against value and set it to intended.
trans-unit.target: 指定此参数时，任务还应修改 diff_against 值并将其设置为预期值。

trans-unit.source: When specifying what service to handle there is a special service value, host, which will handle alerts/downtime for the host itself, e.g., service=host. This keyword may not be given with other services at the same time. Setting alerts/downtime for a host does not affect alerts/downtime for any of the services running on it. To schedule downtime for all services on particular host use keyword “all”, e.g., service=all.
trans-unit.target: 指定要处理的服务时，有一个特殊的服务值host，它将为主机本身处理警报/停机时间，例如 service=host 。此关键字不能与其他服务同时使用。为主机设置警报/停机时间不会影响主机上运行的任何服务的警报/停机时间。要计划特定主机上所有服务的停机时间，请使用关键字“ all”，例如 service=all 。

trans-unit.source: When specifying what service to handle there is a special service value, host, which will handle alerts/downtime/acknowledge for the host itself, e.g., service=host. This keyword may not be given with other services at the same time. Setting alerts/downtime/acknowledge for a host does not affect alerts/downtime/acknowledge for any of the services running on it. To schedule downtime for all services on particular host use keyword “all”, e.g., service=all.
trans-unit.target: 在指定要处理的服务时，有一个特殊的服务值host，它将为主机本身处理警报/停机时间/确认，例如 service=host 。此关键字不能与其他服务同时使用。为主机设置警报/停机/确认不会影响主机上运行的任何服务的警报/停机/确认。要计划特定主机上所有服务的停机时间，请使用关键字“ all”，例如 service=all 。

trans-unit.source: When ssid is not specified then either the serial or first controller IPv4 address will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 当没有指定ssid时,将使用串行或第一个控制器IPv4地址代替。

trans-unit.source: When standard output is returned by the command that is run
trans-unit.target: 当运行的命令返回标准输出时。

trans-unit.source: When state is 'absent' and user exists
trans-unit.target: 当状态为 "不在 "且用户存在时

trans-unit.source: When state is 'present' and the user exists
trans-unit.target: 当状态为 "存在 "且用户存在时。

trans-unit.source: When state is absent attempts to remove the node that the pool member references.
trans-unit.target: absent 状态时，尝试删除池成员引用的节点。

trans-unit.source: When state is absent, the system attempts to remove the node the pool member references.
trans-unit.target: 当state absent ，系统尝试删除池成员引用的节点。

trans-unit.source: When state is args_absent args matching those listed in module_arguments will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 当state为 args_absent 时,与module_arguments中列出的参数匹配的args将被删除。

trans-unit.source: When state is args_present any args listed in module_arguments are added if missing from the existing rule.
trans-unit.target: 当state为 args_present 时，如果现有规则中缺少该参数，则会添加module_arguments中列出的所有args。

trans-unit.source: When state is updated, the module_arguments will replace existing module_arguments.
trans-unit.target: 当状态 updated ，module_arguments将替换现有的module_arguments。

trans-unit.source: When state is present, this will update the name of the cert.
trans-unit.target: 当状态存在时,这将更新cert的名称。

trans-unit.source: When state is present, this will update the path of the cert.
trans-unit.target: 当状态存在时,这将更新cert的路径。

trans-unit.source: When state is query.
trans-unit.target: 当状态为查询。

trans-unit.source: When state is update, will replace name with new_name on IAM resource
trans-unit.target: 当状态更新时,将在IAM资源上用new_name替换name。

trans-unit.source: When state is update, will replace the path with new_path on the IAM resource
trans-unit.target: 当状态更新时,将在IAM资源上用new_path替换路径。

trans-unit.source: When state=absent
trans-unit.target: 当状态=无时

trans-unit.source: When state=present
trans-unit.target: 当state=present时

trans-unit.source: When stderr is returned by a command that is run
trans-unit.target: 当运行的命令返回了stderr时。

trans-unit.source: When storage_encrypted is true
trans-unit.target: 当storage_encrypted为真时

trans-unit.source: When subscription fields are specified
trans-unit.target: 当指定订阅字段时

trans-unit.source: When supplied, this argument restricts the facts collected to a given subset.

trans-unit.source: When supplied, this argument will define the facts to be collected. Possible values for this include all, minimum, config, performance, capacity, network, subnet, interfaces, hgroups, pgroups, hosts, admins, volumes, snapshots, pods, vgroups, offload, apps and arrays.

trans-unit.source: When supplied, this argument will restrict the facts collected to a given subset. Possible values for this argument include all, hardware, config, and interfaces. Can specify a list of values to include a larger subset. Values can also be used with an initial ! to specify that a specific subset should not be collected. To maintain backward compatibility old style facts can be retrieved by explicitly adding ofacts to value, this requires junos-eznc to be installed as a prerequisite. Valid value of gather_subset are default, hardware, config, interfaces, ofacts. If ofacts is present in the list it fetches the old style facts (fact keys without 'ansible_' prefix) and it requires junos-eznc library to be installed on control node and the device login credentials must be given in provider option.
trans-unit.target: 提供此参数后，会将收集到的事实限制为给定的子集。该参数的可能值包括all，hardware，config和interfaces。可以指定值列表以包含更大的子集。值也可以与首字母 ! 指定不应收集特定子集。为了保持向后兼容性，可以通过在值中显式添加 ofacts 来检索旧样式的事实，这要求先安装junos-eznc。 collect_subset的有效值为默认值，硬件，配置，接口，行为。如果 ofacts 出现在列表中，它将获取旧样式的事实（没有'ansible_'前缀的事实键），并且需要在控制节点上安装junos-eznc库，并且设备登录凭据必须在 provider 选项中提供。

Can specify a list of values to include a larger subset. Values can also be used with an initial ! to specify that a specific subset should not be collected.

trans-unit.source: When supplied, this argument will restrict the information returned to a given subset.
trans-unit.target: 当提供这个参数时,这个参数将限制返回给定子集的信息。

trans-unit.source: When supplying a reverse DNS name, you can use the remote option to specify on what remote to look for the flatpak. An example for a reverse DNS name is org.gnome.gedit.
trans-unit.target: 提供反向DNS名称时，可以使用remote选项指定要在哪个远程上查找Flatpak。反向DNS名称的示例是 org.gnome.gedit 。

trans-unit.source: When supplying an http(s) URL with state=absent, the module will try to match the installed flatpak based on the name of the flatpakref to remove it. However, there is no guarantee that the names of the flatpakref file and the reverse DNS name of the installed flatpak do match.
trans-unit.target: 提供状态为= absent的 http(s ）URL 时，模块将尝试根据flatpakref的名称来匹配已安装的flatpak，以将其删除。但是，不能保证flatpakref文件的名称与已安装flatpak的反向DNS名称匹配。

trans-unit.source: When system creates HA group this value is set to 10 by the system.
trans-unit.target: 系统创建HA组时，系统将该值设置为 10 。

trans-unit.source: When task with same description has already finished and you rerun taks it will create new job.
trans-unit.target: 当相同描述的任务已经完成时,您重新运行taks,它将创建新的工作。

trans-unit.source: When the "!" argument precedes fragment argument, the rule will only match head fragments, or unfragmented packets.
trans-unit.target: 当"!"参数在fragment参数之前时,该规则将只匹配头部碎片,或未碎片化的数据包。

trans-unit.source: When the ! argument is used before the interface name, the sense is inverted.
trans-unit.target: 当 ! 参数在接口名称之前使用，含义相反。

trans-unit.source: When the bigip_snat_pool object is removed, it also removes any associated bigip_snat_translation objects.
trans-unit.target: 当 bigip_snat_pool 对象被移除，它也除去任何关联 bigip_snat_translation 对象。

trans-unit.source: When the cipher_group parameter is in use, the ciphers parameter needs to be set to either none or ''.
trans-unit.target: 使用 cipher_group 参数时，需要将 ciphers 参数设置为 none 或 '' 。

trans-unit.source: When the ciphers parameter is in use, the cipher_group must be set to either none or ''.
trans-unit.target: 当 ciphers 参数是在使用中， cipher_group 必须被设置为任一 none 或 '' 。

trans-unit.source: When the destination is not in CIDR notation and a mask is not specified, 255.255.255.255 or ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff is set for IPv4 and IPv6 addresses respectively.
trans-unit.target: 当 destination 不在CIDR格式中并且未指定 mask ，分别为IPv4和IPv6地址设置 255.255.255.255 或 ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff :ffff。

trans-unit.source: When the destination is provided not in CIDR notation and mask is not specified, 255.255.255.255 or ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff is set for IPv4 and IPv6 addresses respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果未以CIDR表示法提供 destination 并且未指定 mask 则分别为IPv4和IPv6地址设置 255.255.255.255 或 ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff:ffff :ffff。

trans-unit.source: When the dialog_aware is yes and the configuration requires multiple SIP virtual server-profile pairings, this string value indicates whether the pair belongs to the same SIP proxy functional group.
trans-unit.target: 当 dialog_aware 为 yes 并且配置需要多个SIP虚拟服务器配置文件配对时，此字符串值指示该配对是否属于同一SIP代理功能组。

trans-unit.source: When the enable_dns_express and enable_zone_transfer settings are both yes, if a zone transfer request matches a DNS Express zone, DNS Express answers the request.
trans-unit.target: 当 enable_dns_express 和 enable_zone_transfer 设置均为 yes 时，如果区域传输请求与DNS Express区域匹配，则DNS Express会回答该请求。

trans-unit.source: When the enable_dns_express and enable_zone_transfer settings are both yes, if a zone transfer request matches a DNS Express zone, then DNS Express answers the request.
trans-unit.target: 当 enable_dns_express 和 enable_zone_transfer 设置均为 yes 时，如果区域传输请求与DNS Express区域匹配，则DNS Express回答该请求。

trans-unit.source: When the enable_dns_express setting is no and the enable_zone_transfer setting is yes, the BIG-IP system processes zone transfer requests based on the last action and answers the request from local BIND or a pool member.
trans-unit.target: 当 enable_dns_express 设置为 no 且 enable_zone_transfer 设置为 yes 时，BIG-IP系统将根据上一个操作处理区域传输请求，并回答来自本地BIND或池成员的请求。

trans-unit.source: When the Ansible controller is running on Python 2.7.9+ or an older version of Python that has backported SSLContext (like Python 2.7.5 on RHEL 7), the controller will attempt to validate the certificate WinRM is using for an HTTPS connection. If the certificate cannot be validated (such as in the case of a self signed cert), it will fail the verification process.
trans-unit.target: 当Ansible控制器运行在Python 2.7.9+或已回传SSLContext的旧版本Python上时(如RHEL 7上的Python 2.7.5),控制器将尝试验证WinRM用于HTTPS连接的证书。如果证书不能被验证(例如在自签名的证书的情况下),它将失败验证过程。

trans-unit.source: When the Ansible is interacting with a specific server, the EC2 inventory script is called again with the --host HOST option. This looks up the HOST in the index cache to get the instance ID, and then makes an API call to AWS to get information about that specific instance. It then makes information about that instance available as variables to your playbooks. Each variable is prefixed by ec2_. Here are some of the variables available:
trans-unit.target: 当Ansible与特定服务器交互时，将使用 --host HOST 选项再次调用EC2库存脚本。这将在索引缓存中查找HOST以获取实例ID，然后对AWS进行API调用以获取有关该特定实例的信息。然后，它将有关该实例的信息作为变量提供给您的剧本。每个变量都以 ec2_ 为前缀。以下是一些可用的变量：

trans-unit.source: When the ETag Validation is enabled, the request will be conditionally processed only if the current ETag for the resource matches the ETag provided in the data.
trans-unit.target: 当启用ETag验证时,只有当资源的当前ETag与数据中提供的ETag相匹配时,请求才会被有条件地处理。

trans-unit.source: When the Galaxy server imports a role, it imports any git tags matching the Semantic Version format as versions. In turn, you can download a specific version of a role by specifying one of the imported tags.
trans-unit.target: 当Galaxy服务器导入角色时，它将与语义版本格式匹配的所有git标签作为版本导入。反过来，您可以通过指定导入的标签之一来下载角色的特定版本。

trans-unit.source: When the Galaxy server imports a role, it imports any git tags matching the Semantic Version format as versions. In turn, you can download a specific version of a role by specifying one of the imported tags.
trans-unit.target: 当Galaxy服务器导入一个角色时,它会将任何与Semantic Version格式相匹配的git标签作为版本导入。反过来,您可以通过指定其中一个导入的标签来下载某个角色的特定版本。

trans-unit.source: When the On Next Boot option is enabled, the host OS reboot, shutdown, or server reset also triggers the associated FSM to apply the changes.
trans-unit.target: 当启用 "下一次启动 "选项时,主机操作系统重启、关机或服务器重置也会触发相关的FSM来应用这些更改。

trans-unit.source: When the P2P hello packet is received, no IP address check is performed. The value is a bool type.
trans-unit.target: 当收到P2P问候包时,不进行IP地址检查。该值为bool类型。

trans-unit.source: When the Secure Access Manager system-load average falls within the specified Max Load Average, the monitor marks the Secure Access Manager system up.
trans-unit.target: 当安全访问管理器的系统负载平均值在指定的最大负载平均值范围内时,监视器会将安全访问管理器系统标记为启动。

trans-unit.source: When the `load_balancing_scheme` is INTERNAL, only instance groups are supported.
trans-unit.target: 当`load_balancing_scheme`为INTERNAL时,只支持实例组。

trans-unit.source: When the average exceeds the setting, the monitor marks the system down.
trans-unit.target: 当平均值超过设定值时,显示器会将系统标记为停机。

trans-unit.source: When the container is stopped, will be used as a timeout for stopping the container. In case the container has a custom StopTimeout configuration, the behavior depends on the version of the docker daemon. New versions of the docker daemon will always use the container's configured StopTimeout value if it has been configured.
trans-unit.target: 当容器停止时，将用作停止容器的超时时间。如果容器具有自定义 StopTimeout 配置，则行为取决于docker守护程序的版本。如果已配置容器，新版本的docker守护程序将始终使用容器的配置 StopTimeout 值。

trans-unit.source: When the creation of an Autoscaler was attempted.
trans-unit.target: 当试图创建一个Autoscaler。

trans-unit.source: When the current role is being executed by means of an include_role or import_role action, this variable contains a list of all parent roles, with the most recent role (in other words, the role that included/imported this role) being the first item in the list. Please refer to ansible_parent_role_names for the order of items in this list.
trans-unit.target: 当通过include_role或import_role操作执行当前角色时，此变量包含所有父角色的列表，其中最新角色（换句话说，包含/导入此角色的角色）是其中的第一项列表。请参阅 ansible_parent_role_names 以获取此列表中项目的顺序。

trans-unit.source: When the current role is being executed by means of an include_role or import_role action, this variable contains a list of all parent roles, with the most recent role (in other words, the role that included/imported this role) being the first item in the list. When multiple inclusions occur, this list lists the last role (in other words, the role that included this role) as the first item in the list. It is also possible that a specific role exists more than once in this list.
trans-unit.target: 当通过include_role或import_role操作执行当前角色时，此变量包含所有父角色的列表，其中最新角色（换句话说，包含/导入此角色的角色）是其中的第一项列表。当出现多个包含时，此列表将最后一个角色（换句话说，包括该角色的角色）列为列表中的第一项。在此列表中，特定角色也可能不止一次存在。

trans-unit.source: When the current role is being executed by means of an include_role or import_role action, this variable contains a list of all parent roles, with the most recent role (i.e. the role that included/imported this role) being the first item in the list. Please refer to ansible_parent_role_names for the order of items in this list.
trans-unit.target: 当通过include_role或import_role操作执行当前角色时，此变量包含所有父角色的列表，而最新角色（即包含/导入此角色的角色）是列表中的第一项。请参阅 ansible_parent_role_names 以获取此列表中项目的顺序。

trans-unit.source: When the current role is being executed by means of an include_role or import_role action, this variable contains a list of all parent roles, with the most recent role (i.e. the role that included/imported this role) being the first item in the list. When multiple inclusions occur, this list lists the last role (i.e. the role that included this role) as the first item in the list. It is also possible that a specific role exists more than once in this list.
trans-unit.target: 当通过include_role或import_role操作执行当前角色时，此变量包含所有父角色的列表，而最新角色（即包含/导入此角色的角色）是列表中的第一项。当出现多个包含时，此列表将最后一个角色（即，包含此角色的角色）列为列表中的第一项。在此列表中，特定角色也可能不止一次存在。

trans-unit.source: When the delete of an Autoscaler was attempted.
trans-unit.target: 当试图删除一个Autoscaler时。

trans-unit.source: When the domain expires
trans-unit.target: 当域名过期时

trans-unit.source: When the domain was created
trans-unit.target: 域名创建时

trans-unit.source: When the domain was updated last.
trans-unit.target: 域名最后更新的时间。

trans-unit.source: When the group does exist and state=absent, the group will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当该组确实存在且state=absent时,该组将被删除。

trans-unit.source: When the group does not exist in GitLab, it will be created.
trans-unit.target: 当GitLab中不存在该组时,将创建该组。

trans-unit.source: When the host determines which slots this guest should be assigned to, only slots in this list will be considered.
trans-unit.target: 当主机确定该客人应该被分配到哪些槽位时,将只考虑这个列表中的槽位。

trans-unit.source: When the host determines which slots this guest should be assigned, only slots in this list are considered.
trans-unit.target: 当主机确定应该给这个客人分配哪些槽位时,只考虑这个列表中的槽位。

trans-unit.source: When the hypervisor name is specified the newly created disk or an existing disk will refresh its information about the underlying storage( Disk size, Serial, Product ID, Vendor ID ...) The specified host will be used for gathering the storage related information. This option is only valid for passthrough disks. This option requires at least the logical_unit.id to be specified
trans-unit.target: 当指定hypervisor名称时,新创建的磁盘或现有的磁盘将刷新其有关底层存储的信息(磁盘大小、序列号、产品ID、供应商ID......),指定的主机将用于收集存储相关信息。此选项仅对直通磁盘有效。此选项至少需要指定逻辑单元ID。

trans-unit.source: When the interval expires, the resource is marked 'up'.
trans-unit.target: 当时间间隔到期时,该资源被标记为 "up"。

trans-unit.source: When the k8s context is using a user credentials with refresh tokens (like oidc or gke/gcloud auth), the token is refreshed by the k8s python client library but not saved by default. So the old refresh token can expire and the next auth might fail. Setting this flag to true will tell the k8s python client to save the new refresh token to the kube config file.
trans-unit.target: 当k8s上下文使用带有刷新令牌的用户凭证时(如oidc或gke/gcloud auth),令牌会被k8s python客户端库刷新,但默认不保存。所以旧的刷新令牌可能会过期,下一次认证可能会失败。将这个标志设置为true,会告诉k8s python客户端将新的刷新令牌保存到kube配置文件中。

trans-unit.source: When the list element is a dict with the keys value, masked and protected, the user can have full control about whether a value should be masked, protected or both.
trans-unit.target: 当list元素是具有值value，masked和protected的dict时，用户可以完全控制值是应该被屏蔽，被保护还是两者都被控制。

trans-unit.source: When the list element is a simple key-value pair, masked and protected will be set to false.
trans-unit.target: 当列表元素是一个简单的键值对时,屏蔽和保护将被设置为false。

trans-unit.source: When the list element is a simple key-value pair, set masked and protected to false.
trans-unit.target: 当列表元素是一个简单的键值对时,将 masked 和 protected 设置为 false。

trans-unit.source: When the load balancing scheme is EXTERNAL, can be NONE, CLIENT_IP, or GENERATED_COOKIE.
trans-unit.target: 当负载均衡方案为EXTERNAL时,可以是NONE、CLIENT_IP或GENERATED_COOKIE。

trans-unit.source: When the load balancing scheme is EXTERNAL, for global forwarding rules, the address must be a global IP, and for regional forwarding rules, the address must live in the same region as the forwarding rule. If this field is empty, an ephemeral IPv4 address from the same scope (global or regional) will be assigned. A regional forwarding rule supports IPv4 only. A global forwarding rule supports either IPv4 or IPv6.
trans-unit.target: 当负载均衡方案为EXTERNAL时,对于全局转发规则,地址必须是全局IP,对于区域转发规则,地址必须与转发规则生活在同一区域。如果该字段为空,则会分配一个来自同一范围(全局或区域)的短暂IPv4地址。区域转发规则只支持IPv4。全局转发规则支持IPv4或IPv6。

trans-unit.source: When the load balancing scheme is INTERNAL, a single port or a comma separated list of ports can be configured. Only packets addressed to these ports will be forwarded to the backends configured with this forwarding rule.
trans-unit.target: 当负载均衡方案为INTERNAL时,可以配置单个端口或逗号分隔的端口列表。只有发往这些端口的数据包才会被转发到用该转发规则配置的后端。

trans-unit.source: When the load balancing scheme is INTERNAL, only TCP and UDP are valid.
trans-unit.target: 当负载均衡方案为INTERNAL时,只有TCP和UDP有效。

trans-unit.source: When the load balancing scheme is INTERNAL, this can only be an RFC 1918 IP address belonging to the network/subnet configured for the forwarding rule. By default, if this field is empty, an ephemeral internal IP address will be automatically allocated from the IP range of the subnet or network configured for this forwarding rule.
trans-unit.target: 当负载均衡方案为INTERNAL时,只能是属于为转发规则配置的网络/子网的RFC 1918 IP地址。默认情况下,如果该字段为空,将从为该转发规则配置的子网或网络的IP范围中自动分配一个短暂的内部IP地址。

trans-unit.source: When the load balancing scheme is INTERNAL, this field is not used.
trans-unit.target: 当负载均衡方案为INTERNAL时,不使用该字段。

trans-unit.source: When the machine is created it can optionally wait for public IP address, or for active state.
trans-unit.target: 当机器被创建时,它可以选择等待公共IP地址,或者等待活动状态。

trans-unit.source: When the method is not delete
trans-unit.target: 当该方法不被删除时

trans-unit.source: When the module has changed something.
trans-unit.target: 当模块有变化的时候。

trans-unit.source: When the module has encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: 当模块遇到错误时。

trans-unit.source: When the monitor is in reverse mode, a successful receive string match marks the monitored object down instead of up. You can use the this mode only if you configure the receive option.
trans-unit.target: 当监视器处于反向模式时，成功的接收字符串匹配会将受监视的对象标记为向下而不是向上。仅当配置 receive 选项时，才能使用此模式。

trans-unit.source: When the number of in-use licensed connections exceeds 95 percent, the monitor marks the Secure Access Manager system down.
trans-unit.target: 当使用中的许可连接数超过95%时,监视器会将安全访问管理器系统标记为关闭。

trans-unit.source: When the order expires.
trans-unit.target: 当订单到期后。

trans-unit.source: When the os_type is Linux, setting ssh_password_enabled=false will disable SSH password authentication and require use of SSH keys.
trans-unit.target: 当os_type为Linux时，设置ssh_password_enabled = false将禁用SSH密码身份验证，并且需要使用SSH密钥。

trans-unit.source: When the percentage thin_volume_repo_size of thin_volume_max_repo_size exceeds thin_volume_growth_alert_threshold then a warning will be issued and the storage array will execute the thin_volume_expansion_policy policy.
trans-unit.target: 当thin_volume_max_repo_size的thin_volume_repo_size百分比超过thin_volume_growth_alert_threshold时，将发出警告，并且存储阵列将执行thin_volume_expansion_policy策略。

trans-unit.source: When the percentage of used storage of the maximum repository size exceeds this value then a alert will be issued and the thin_volume_expansion_policy will be executed.
trans-unit.target: 当最大存储库大小的已用存储百分比超出此值时，将发出警报并执行thin_volume_expansion_policy。

trans-unit.source: When the pool is referenced in full path format, the partition parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当以全路径格式引用池时，将忽略 partition 参数。

trans-unit.source: When the project does exists and state=absent, the project will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当项目确实存在且state=absent时,项目将被删除。

trans-unit.source: When the project does not exist in GitLab, it will be created.
trans-unit.target: 当项目在GitLab中不存在时,会被创建。

trans-unit.source: When the protocol is UDP, this field is not used.
trans-unit.target: 当协议为UDP时,不使用此字段。

trans-unit.source: When the record was created
trans-unit.target: 创建记录的时间

trans-unit.source: When the record was updated
trans-unit.target: 更新记录的时间

trans-unit.source: When the relative size of delta vs pkg is larger than this, delta is not used. Use 0 to turn off delta rpm processing. Local repositories (with file:// baseurl) have delta rpms turned off by default.
trans-unit.target: 当delta与pkg的相对大小大于此值时，将不使用delta。使用 0 关闭增量rpm处理。本地存储库（使用file：// baseurl）默认情况下已关闭增量rpm。

trans-unit.source: When the relative size of deltarpm metadata vs pkgs is larger than this, deltarpm metadata is not downloaded from the repo. Note that you can give values over 100, so 200 means that the metadata is required to be half the size of the packages. Use 0 to turn off this check, and always download metadata.
trans-unit.target: 当deltarpm元数据与pkgs的相对大小大于此值时，就不会从仓库中下载deltarpm元数据。请注意，您可以提供超过 100 的值，因此 200 表示要求元数据为程序包大小的一半。使用 0 关闭此检查，并始终下载元数据。

trans-unit.source: When the security policy enforcement mode is Blocking, displays how the system treats requests that match a signature included in the signature set.
trans-unit.target: 当安全策略执行模式为阻断时,显示系统如何处理与签名集中的签名匹配的请求。

trans-unit.source: When the service is set to start.
trans-unit.target: 当服务设置为启动时。

trans-unit.source: When the state is present the volume is mapped. When the state is absent, the volume is meant to be unmapped.
trans-unit.target: 当状态存在时,体积被映射。当该状态不存在时,该体积意味着未映射。

trans-unit.source: When the storage pool is a raidDiskPool then the segment size must be 128kb.
trans-unit.target: 当存储池是raidDiskPool时,那么段的大小必须是128kb。

trans-unit.source: When the type is a domain type, the credential is used by Microsoft authentication packages like Negotiate.
trans-unit.target: 当类型是 domain 类型时，该凭据将由Microsoft身份验证程序包（如Negotiate）使用。

trans-unit.source: When the type is a generic type, the credential is not used by any particular authentication package.
trans-unit.target: 当类型是 generic 类型时，任何特定的身份验证包都不使用该凭据。

trans-unit.source: When the update of an Autoscaler was attempted.
trans-unit.target: 当试图更新一个Autoscaler时。

trans-unit.source: When the user does exists and state=absent, the user will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当用户确实存在且状态=不存在时,该用户将被删除。

trans-unit.source: When the user does not exist in GitLab, it will be created.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在GitLab中不存在时,将会被创建。

trans-unit.source: When the user exists and state=absent, the user will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当用户存在且state=absent时,用户将被删除。

trans-unit.source: When the user exists and state=blocked, the user will be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 当用户存在且状态=blocked时,该用户将被屏蔽。

trans-unit.source: When the user leaves maintenance mode, the original send-interval is reinstated.
trans-unit.target: 当用户离开维护模式时,恢复原来的发送间隔。

trans-unit.source: When the value is set to all-day both daily_hour_end and daily_hour_start are reset to their respective defaults.
trans-unit.target: 当该值设置为 all-day ， daily_hour_end 和 daily_hour_start 都将重置为其各自的默认值。

trans-unit.source: When the value is set to empty list, the parameter value is removed from device.
trans-unit.target: 当值设置为空列表时,参数值将从设备中删除。

trans-unit.source: When the vs is scaled out, the ssl session information is synced to the new se, allowing existing ssl sessions to be reused on the new se.
trans-unit.target: 当 vs 规模缩小时,ssl 会话信息会同步到新的 se 上,允许现有的 ssl 会话在新的 se 上被重新使用。

trans-unit.source: When this is set to different the MD5 sum of the local file is compared with the 'ETag' of the object/key in S3. The ETag may or may not be an MD5 digest of the object data. See the ETag response header here https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/API/RESTCommonResponseHeaders.html.
trans-unit.target: 如果将其设置为 different 值，则在S3中将本地文件的MD5总和与对象/键的“ ETag”进行比较。ETag可能是对象数据的MD5摘要，也可能不是。在此处https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/API/RESTCommonResponseHeaders.html上查看ETag响应标头。

trans-unit.source: When this module is called with the deprecated onepassword_facts name, potentially sensitive data from 1Password is returned as Ansible facts. Facts are subject to caching if enabled, which means this data could be stored in clear text on disk or in a database.
trans-unit.target: 当使用不赞成使用的 onepassword_facts 名称调用该模块时，将返回来自1Password的潜在敏感数据作为Ansible事实。如果启用了事实，则将对事实进行缓存，这意味着该数据可以以明文形式存储在磁盘或数据库中。

trans-unit.source: When this module is used to change the repository states, this list contains the updated states after the changes.
trans-unit.target: 当该模块用于更改存储库状态时,该列表包含更改后的更新状态。

trans-unit.source: When this option is false all the functions will be built, but no stack update will be run to send them out.
trans-unit.target: 如果此选项为 false ，则将构建所有功能，但不会运行堆栈更新将其发送出去。

trans-unit.source: When this option is yes, a client connection that does not specify a known server name or does not support SNI extension will be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 如果此选项为 yes ，则拒绝未指定已知服务器名称或不支持SNI扩展的客户端连接。

trans-unit.source: When this option is configure as startup, the module will return the diff of the running-config against the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 当将此选项配置为startup时，模块将返回running-config与配置的差异。

trans-unit.source: When this option is configure as startup, the module will return the diff of the running-config against the startup configuration.
trans-unit.target: 当此选项配置为startup时，模块将针对启动配置返回running-config的差异。

trans-unit.source: When this option is configure as startup, the module will return the diff of the running-config against the startup-config.
trans-unit.target: 当此选项配置为startup时，模块将针对running-config返回running-config的差异。

trans-unit.source: When this option is configured as session, the diff returned will be based on the configuration session.
trans-unit.target: 当此选项配置为 session 时，返回的差异将基于配置会话。

trans-unit.source: When this option is configured as intended, the module will return the diff of the running-config against the configuration provided in the intended_config argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果按预期配置了此选项，则模块将针对所 intended_config 的配置参数中提供的配置返回运行配置的差异。

trans-unit.source: When this option is configured as running, the module will return the before and after diff of the running-config with respect to any changes made to the device configuration.
trans-unit.target: 当此选项配置为running时，模块将针对对设备配置所做的任何更改返回running-config的diff前后。

trans-unit.source: When this option is configured as startup, the module will return the diff of the running-config against the startup-config.
trans-unit.target: 当此选项配置为startup时，模块将针对running-config返回running-config的差异。

trans-unit.source: When this option is enabled, configuration, logs, and other support-related information will be relayed to NetApp to help better support your system. No personally identifiable information, passwords, etc, will be collected.
trans-unit.target: 启用该选项后,配置、日志和其他支持相关信息将被传送到 NetApp,以帮助更好地支持您的系统。不会收集个人身份信息、密码等。

trans-unit.source: When this option is true, then syspurpose attributes are synchronized with RHSM server immediately. When this option is false, then syspurpose attributes will be synchronized with RHSM server by rhsmcertd daemon.
trans-unit.target: 当这个选项为真时,那么syspurpose属性会立即与RHSM服务器同步。当这个选项为false时,那么syspurpose属性将由rhsmcertd守护进程与RHSM服务器同步。

trans-unit.source: When this parameter is greater than 0, a difference in size between what is expected and what is configured is ignored if it is below the threshold.
trans-unit.target: 当该参数大于0时,如果低于阈值,则忽略预期和配置的大小差异。

trans-unit.source: When this parameter is set to True, controllers parameter will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 当此参数设置为 True 时，将忽略 controllers 参数。

trans-unit.source: When this parameter is set to yes, no change will be reported by the module.
trans-unit.target: 当此参数设置为 yes 时，模块将不报告任何更改。

trans-unit.source: When this parameter is set, the module will not be idempotent.
trans-unit.target: 当设置该参数时,模块将不具有幂等性。

trans-unit.source: When this parameter is true, networking is disabled within the container.
trans-unit.target: 当此参数为 "true "时,容器内的联网将被禁用。

trans-unit.source: When this parameter is true, the container is given elevated privileges on the host container instance (similar to the root user).
trans-unit.target: 当此参数为 "true "时,容器被赋予主机容器实例上的高权限(类似于根用户)。

trans-unit.source: When this parameter is true, the container is given elevated privileges on the host container instance (similar to the root user). This parameter maps to Privileged in the Create a container section of the Docker Remote API and the --privileged option to docker run.
trans-unit.target: 当此参数为真时,容器在主机容器实例上被赋予高权限(类似于根用户)。这个参数映射到Docker Remote API的Create a container部分的Privileged和docker run的--privileged选项中。

trans-unit.source: When this parameter is true, the container is given read-only access to its root file system.
trans-unit.target: 当此参数为真时,容器被赋予对其根文件系统的只读访问权。

trans-unit.source: When this parameter is true, the container is given read-only access to its root file system. This parameter maps to ReadonlyRootfs in the Create a container section of the Docker Remote API and the --read-only option to docker run.
trans-unit.target: 当此参数为真时,容器将被赋予对其根文件系统的只读访问权限。这个参数映射到Docker Remote API的Create a container部分的ReadonlyRootfs和docker run的--read-only选项。

trans-unit.source: When this rule is matched, the request is redirected to a URL specified by urlRedirect. If urlRedirect is specified, service or routeAction must not be set.
trans-unit.target: 当该规则被匹配时,请求会被重定向到由urlRedirect指定的URL。如果指定了urlRedirect,则不能设置service或routeAction。

trans-unit.source: When this setting is absent, delivery of all AutoSupport messages is turned off.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有此设置,则会关闭所有自动支持消息的传送。

trans-unit.source: When this value is set to 0 (zero), the system uses the interval from the parent monitor.
trans-unit.target: 当该值设置为0(零)时,系统使用父显示器的间隔。

trans-unit.source: When this value is specified, we will always trigger an update (changed=True). We have no way of verifying whether or not the password has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当指定这个值时,我们总是会触发更新(changed=True)。我们没有办法验证密码是否已经改变。

trans-unit.source: When to disable handling of check failures
trans-unit.target: 何时禁用检查失败的处理

trans-unit.source: When to enable handling of check failures
trans-unit.target: 何时启用检查失败的处理

trans-unit.source: When to quote variables (a YAML gotcha)
trans-unit.target: 什么时候引用变量(YAML的疑难杂症)

trans-unit.source: When to update user passwords.
trans-unit.target: 什么时候更新用户密码。

trans-unit.source: When true it forces Eth-Trunk members to match what is declared in the members param. This can be used to remove members.
trans-unit.target: 当为真时,它会强制Eth-Trunk成员与成员参数中声明的内容相匹配。这可以用来删除成员。

trans-unit.source: When true it forces link aggregation group members to match what is declared in the members param. This can be used to remove members.
trans-unit.target: 当为 "true "时,它会强制链接聚合组成员与成员参数中声明的内容相匹配。这可以用来删除成员。

trans-unit.source: When true sets the grace_fulrestart config alone.
trans-unit.target: 当为真时,单独设置grace_fulrestart配置。

trans-unit.source: When true sets the log_adjacency_changes config alone.
trans-unit.target: 当为真时,单独设置log_adjacency_changes配置。

trans-unit.source: When true sets the stub config alone.
trans-unit.target: 当为真时,单独设置存根配置。

trans-unit.source: When true this limits the scale set to a single placement group, of max size 100 virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: 当为 "true "时,这将限制规模设置为单个放置组,最大规模为100个虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: When true, Memset won't remind the customer that monitoring is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 当为真时,Memset不会提醒客户监控已被禁用。

trans-unit.source: When true, equivalent to both commit and abort being true. Mutually exclusive with commit and atomic.
trans-unit.target: 为true时，等同于commit和abort为true。与commit和atomic互斥。

trans-unit.source: When true, if the host key is unknown, accept it, but report a warning.
trans-unit.target: 当为真时,如果主机密钥未知,则接受它,但报告一个警告。

trans-unit.source: When true, if the search expression contains a UID or a name of a group object, results will include rules that match on at least one member of the group.
trans-unit.target: 当为 "true "时,如果搜索表达式中包含一个UID或组对象的名称,结果将包括至少一个组成员的匹配规则。

trans-unit.source: When true, if the search expression contains a UID or a name of a group-with-exclusion object, results will include rules that match at least one member of the "include" part and is not a member of the "except" part.
trans-unit.target: 当为真时,如果搜索表达式包含一个UID或一个带有排除对象的组的名称,结果将包括至少一个与 "include "部分的成员相匹配的规则,并且不是 "except "部分的成员。

trans-unit.source: When true, performs a 'net commit' at the end of the block. Mutually exclusive with atomic.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则在块的末尾执行“ net commit”。与原子互斥。

trans-unit.source: When true, the group with exclusion's matched content is displayed as ranges of IP addresses rather than network objects.<br />Objects that are not represented using IP addresses are presented as objects.<br />The 'include' and 'except' parameters are omitted from the response and instead the 'ranges' parameter is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则具有排除内容的匹配组将显示为IP地址范围而不是网络对象。<br />未使用IP地址表示的对象将显示为对象。<br />“ include”和“ except”响应中省略了参数，而是显示“范围”参数。

trans-unit.source: When true, the group's matched content is displayed as ranges of IP addresses rather than network objects.<br />Objects that are not represented using IP addresses are presented as objects.<br />The 'members' parameter is omitted from the response and instead the 'ranges' parameter is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则组的匹配内容显示为IP地址范围而不是网络对象。<br />未使用IP地址表示的对象显示为对象。<br />响应中省略了“ members”参数而是显示“范围”参数。

trans-unit.source: When true, the service group's matched content is displayed as ranges of port numbers rather than service objects.<br />Objects that are not represented using port numbers are presented as objects.<br />The 'members' parameter is omitted from the response and instead the 'ranges' parameter is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 设置为true时，服务组的匹配内容显示为端口号范围，而不是服务对象。<br />未使用端口号表示的对象显示为对象。<br />响应，而是显示“范围”参数。

trans-unit.source: When true, the source, destination and services & applications parameters are displayed as ranges of IP addresses and port numbers rather than network objects.<br /> Objects that are not represented using IP addresses or port numbers are presented as objects.<br /> In addition, the response of each rule does not contain the parameters, source, source-negate, destination, destination-negate, service and service-negate, but instead it contains the parameters, source-ranges, destination-ranges and service-ranges.<br /><br /> Note, Requesting to show rules as ranges is limited up to 20 rules per request, otherwise an error is returned. If you wish to request more rules, use the offset and limit parameters to limit your request.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则将源，目标以及服务和应用程序参数显示为IP地址和端口号的范围，而不是网络对象。<br />未使用IP地址或端口号表示的对象将显示为对象。<br / >此外，每个规则的响应不包含参数，源，源求反，目标，目标求反，服务和服务求反，而是包含参数，源范围，目标范围和服务- <br /> <br />注意，每个规则要求将规则显示为范围限制为每个请求最多20条规则，否则将返回错误。如果您希望请求更多规则，请使用offset和limit参数限制请求。

trans-unit.source: When trusting a new device, if this parameter is not specified, the value of peer_server is used as a default.
trans-unit.target: 信任新设备时，如果未指定此参数，则将 peer_server 的值用作默认值。

trans-unit.source: When trusting a new device, if this parameter is not specified, the value of peer_server will be used as a default.
trans-unit.target: 信任新设备时，如果未指定此参数，则将使用 peer_server 的值作为默认值。

trans-unit.source: When trying to delete a bucket, delete all keys (including versions and delete markers) in the bucket first (an S3 bucket must be empty for a successful deletion).
trans-unit.target: 当尝试删除一个 bucket 时,先删除 bucket 中的所有键(包括版本和删除标记)(S3 bucket 必须为空才能成功删除)。

trans-unit.source: When trying to delete a bucket, delete all keys (including versions and delete markers) in the bucket first (an s3 bucket must be empty for a successful deletion)
trans-unit.target: 当尝试删除一个 bucket 时,先删除 bucket 中的所有 key(包括版本和删除标记)(一个 s3 bucket 必须是空的才能成功删除)。

trans-unit.source: When trying to set 'processModel.password' and you receive a 'Value does fall within the expected range' error, you have a corrupted keystore. Please follow http://structuredsight.com/2014/10/26/im-out-of-range-youre-out-of-range/ to help fix your host.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置“ processModel.password”时，您收到“值确实在预期范围内”错误，则密钥库已损坏。请按照http://structuredsight.com/2014/10/26/im-out-of-range-youre-out-of-range/帮助修复主机。

trans-unit.source: When type is user and state is present, define the users login password. Also works with update. Note that always returns changed.
trans-unit.target: 当类型为用户且存在状态时,定义用户登录密码。也适用于更新。注意,总是返回已更改。

trans-unit.source: When type is user, it creates, removes, deactivates or activates a user's access key(s). Note that actions apply only to keys specified.
trans-unit.target: 当类型为用户时,创建、删除、停用或激活用户的访问密钥。请注意,操作只适用于指定的密钥。

trans-unit.source: When unset (default), use default or puppet.conf value if defined.
trans-unit.target: 取消设置时(默认),使用默认值或puppet.conf值(如果定义了)。

trans-unit.source: When unset, this parameter defaults to the current user.
trans-unit.target: 取消设置时,该参数默认为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: When unset, this parameter defaults to using root.
trans-unit.target: 取消设置时，此参数默认为使用 root 。

trans-unit.source: When unset, this value defaults to ~/.ssh/authorized_keys.
trans-unit.target: 取消设置时，此值默认为〜/ .ssh / authorized_keys。

trans-unit.source: When unspecified, will pick 80 or 443 based on the value of use_ssl.
trans-unit.target: 未指定时,将根据use_ssl的值选择80或443。

trans-unit.source: When updating a group, where possible provide the group ID to the module. This removes a lookup to the API to translate the name into the group ID.
trans-unit.target: 当更新一个组时,在可能的情况下,提供组的ID给模块。这样就不需要通过API查找来将名称翻译成组的ID。

trans-unit.source: When updating an existing repository, all options except name are optional. Only supplied options will be updated. Use force=True to exactly match.
trans-unit.target: 更新现有存储库时，除名称外的所有选项都是可选的。仅提供的选件将被更新。使用force = True完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: When updating existing container all existing commands will be replaced by new ones.
trans-unit.target: 当更新现有的容器时,所有现有的命令将被新的命令所取代。

trans-unit.source: When updating existing container all existing variables will be replaced by new ones.
trans-unit.target: 当更新现有容器时,所有现有的变量将被新的变量所取代。

trans-unit.source: When updating or removing packages, delete the extra configuration file(s) in the old packages which are annotated with @extra in the packaging-list.

trans-unit.source: When using ansible-vault commands that encrypt content (ansible-vault encrypt, ansible-vault encrypt_string, etc) only one vault-id can be used.

trans-unit.source: When using aggregates, if one of the aggregate definitions is invalid, the aggregate run will fail, indicating the error it last encountered.
trans-unit.target: 使用 aggregates ，如果其中一个聚合定义无效，则聚合运行将失败，表明它最后遇到的错误。

trans-unit.source: When using become_user to a user other than root, the module arguments are briefly written into a random tempfile in /tmp. These are deleted immediately after the command is executed. This only occurs when changing privileges from a user like ‘bob’ to ‘timmy’, not when going from ‘bob’ to ‘root’, or logging in directly as ‘bob’ or ‘root’. If it concerns you that this data is briefly readable (not writable), avoid transferring unencrypted passwords with become_user set. In other cases, /tmp is not used and this does not come into play. Ansible also takes care to not log password parameters.
trans-unit.target: 将 become_user root以外的用户时，模块参数将简短地写入 /tmp 中的随机tempfile中。这些命令执行后立即删除。仅当将特权从“ bob”用户更改为“ timmy”时发生，而不是从“ bob”更改为“ root”，或直接以“ bob”或“ root”身份登录时，才会发生这种情况。如果您担心此数据是短暂可读（不可写）的，请避免使用 become_user 设置传输未加密的密码。在其他情况下，不使用 /tmp ，这也不起作用。 Ansible还注意不要记录密码参数。

trans-unit.source: When using dir, this module will, by default, recursively go through each sub directory and load up the variables. By explicitly setting the depth, this module will only go as deep as the depth.
trans-unit.target: 使用 dir 时，默认情况下，此模块将递归地遍历每个子目录并加载变量。通过显式设置深度，此模块将仅达到深度。

trans-unit.source: When using dist-upgrade, name should be '*'.
trans-unit.target: 使用 dist-upgrade 时，名称应为 '*' 。

trans-unit.source: When using gssapi, run kinit before running Ansible to get a valid Kerberos ticket.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gssapi 时，请在运行Ansible之前运行 kinit 以获得有效的Kerberos票证。

trans-unit.source: When using ldap, it is recommended to set auth=gssapi, or start_tls=yes, otherwise traffic will be in plaintext.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ldap 时，建议设置 auth=gssapi 或 start_tls=yes ，否则流量将采用纯文本格式。

trans-unit.source: When using rax.py, you will not have a ‘localhost’ defined in the inventory.
trans-unit.target: 使用 rax.py 时，清单中将没有定义“ localhost”。

trans-unit.source: When using scheme=ldaps or start_tls=yes, this controls the certificate validation behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 使用 scheme=ldaps 或 start_tls=yes 时，这将控制证书验证行为。

trans-unit.source: When using simple, the username and password options must be set. If not using scheme=ldaps or start_tls=True then these credentials are exposed in plaintext in the network traffic.
trans-unit.target: 使用 simple 时，必须设置用户名和密码选项。如果未使用 scheme=ldaps 或 start_tls=True ,则这些凭据将以纯文本格式显示在网络流量中。

trans-unit.source: When using state=clean, the releases are ordered by creation date. You should be able to switch to a new naming strategy without problems.
trans-unit.target: 使用 state=clean 时，发布按创建日期排序。您应该能够毫无问题地切换到新的命名策略。

trans-unit.source: When using state=latest, this can be '*', which updates all installed packages managed by pkgutil.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 state=latest 时，它可以是 '*' ，它将更新由pkgutil管理的所有已安装软件包。

trans-unit.source: When using vars: within the roles: section of a playbook, the variables are added to the play variables, making them available to all tasks within the play before and after the role. This behavior can be changed by DEFAULT_PRIVATE_ROLE_VARS.
trans-unit.target: 在剧本的 roles: 部分中使用 vars: 时，会将变量添加到play变量中，使它们可用于角色之前和之后的所有任务。可以通过DEFAULT_PRIVATE_ROLE_VARS更改此行为。

trans-unit.source: When using version in a playbook or role, don’t use {{ }} as described in the FAQ:
trans-unit.target: 在剧本或角色中使用 version 时，请勿按照常见问题解答中的说明使用 {{ }} ：
